§6Pyrotheum Dust§r is a §efire elemental dust§r. It can be used to make it's fluid form: §9Blazing Pyrotheum§r, which is the §ehottest fluid in all of §7Factoriocraft§r; reaching up to §c4000K§r which is almost §e4 times of hot Lava is§r. Other than that, the dust can be used to §edirectly smelt Ores in the Crafting Grid§r and make Resonant-related items.

To make it, you'll need 2 §6Blaze Powder§r, §6Sulfur§r, and §6Redstone Dust§r.
